rules.description: left_shift button becomes escape if tapped and shift if held or used in combo with something else
grave_accent_and_tilde button becomes hyper if held or used in combo with something else
Arrow Keys as Vim Movement Keys HJKL (Qwerty) with hyper
Arrow Keys as Vim Movement Keys HJKL (Qwerty)

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "⌘"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "⌥"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

rules.description: Convert right hand homerow into arrows much like vim motions with the ` layer
